text: Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl yɨbɨl ak anɨb agɨl, bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep bɨawl ne omɨŋal ak kɨlop suk agek apel agak, Mɨñɨl maynab ayaŋ, taun Sisaliya amnɨmɨb agak. Bɨ chɨm kadɨŋ gep okok kɨlop 200 ak dɨl, bɨ kusal dɨnɨgel okok kɨlop 200 ak dɨl, bɨ chag hos sek dɨnɨgel okok kɨlop 70 ak dɨl dad amnɨmɨb agak.
